help-file.title: "ARIEKS SHATTERING ICEBALL" ICEBALL
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Elemental
The legendary shaman Ariek discovered eons ago how to rapidly cool the air before him and extract the moisture from it, almost instantly condensing it into a large, jagged and sharp ball of ice. The ball of ice then propels itself blindingly fast towards its victim causing bloody wounds after shattering.
